title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

blMessageId.title: The blMessageId schema
blMessageId.description: Unique Shipment ID has to be put into this field. It should not be the BL Number because in case of changing the carrier the message would not be found in the time-triggered database. For House BLs this field should contain the BL MESSAGE ID (contains Master BL Shipment ID).

houseBlRunningNumber.title: The houseBlRunningNumber schema
houseBlRunningNumber.description: To guarantee the correct sequence of the House BLs for a Master-BL..

etdDate.title: The etdDate schema
etdDate.description: Date expected to depart in YYYYMMDD format. If not available use 00000000.

etdTime.title: The etdTime schema
etdTime.description: Time expected to depart in HHMM format. If not available use 0000.

timeZone.title: The timeZone schema
timeZone.description: Timezone of shipping office eg GMT.

etaDate.title: The etaDate schema
etaDate.description: Date expected to arrive in YYYYMMDD format. If not available use 00000000.

etaTime.title: The etaTime schema
etaTime.description: Time expected to arrive in HHMM format. If not available use 0000.

creationDate.title: The creationDate schema
creationDate.description: Date message was created in YYYYMMDD format.

creationTime.title: The creationTime schema
creationTime.description: Time message was created in HHMM format. If not available use 0000

houseBlUsingCode.title: The houseBlUsingCode schema
houseBlUsingCode.description: O - Data sent by branch owning shipment, F - Data sent by a branch not owning the shipment.

natureOfGoods.title: The natureOfGoods schema
natureOfGoods.description: Nature of goods: GEN - General or HAZ - Hazardous.

finalDestinationBranch.title: The finalDestinationBranch schema
finalDestinationBranch.description: Schenker Code appended by the Code SSF for SeaFreight.

status.title: The status schema
status.description: BL Version Number - Defaulted by Schenker Mapping.

header.title: The header schema
header.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

documentCode.title: The documentCode schema
documentCode.description: Document Code: 703 - House BL, 704 - Master BL, 705 - Direct BL.

messageId.title: The messageId schema
messageId.description: BL Message Identification. Bill of Lading Number.

documentPlace.title: The documentPlace schema
documentPlace.description: UN location code for place of issue of BOL.

documentDate.title: The documentDate schema
documentDate.description: Date the document was issued in format YYYYMMDD.

numberOfOriginals.title: The numberOfOriginals schema
numberOfOriginals.description: Number of Originals of document to be issued.

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

theader.title: The theader schema
theader.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

modeOfTransport.title: The modeOfTransport schema
modeOfTransport.description: Code identifying the mode of transport: 10 - Maritime Transport.

typeOfTransport.title: The typeOfTransport schema
typeOfTransport.description: Code identifying the type of transport: 11 - Ship, 13 = Ocean Vessel.

transportId.title: The transportId schema
transportId.description: Name of the vessel or ship.

tdates.title: The tdates schema
tdates.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

tdate.title: The tdate schema
tdate.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

transportQualifier.title: The transportQualifier schema
transportQualifier.description: Code identifying type of date: 11 = Shipped on Board Date, 118 = Booked at Date (= Confirmed at) 132 = Estimated Date of Arrival, 133 = Estimated Date of Departure. 136 = Departure Date

transportDateFormat.title: The transportDateFormat schema
transportDateFormat.description: Code identifying the date Format: 102 - YYYYMMDD

placeQualifier.title: The placeQualifier schema
placeQualifier.description: Code identifying type of place referred to.

addressQualifier.title: The addressQualifier schema
addressQualifier.description: Code definining the party the address belongs to.

numberOfPackages.title: The numberOfPackages schema
numberOfPackages.description: The number of packages in this unit.

measureQualifier.title: The measureQualifier schema
measureQualifier.description: define type of weight being measured - WT/ VOL.

measureUnit.title: Unit of measure
measureUnit.description: Units of Measure: KGM - Kilogram, MTQ - Cubic meters.

package.title: The package schema
package.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

totalNumberPackages.title: The totalNumberPackages schema
totalNumberPackages.description: The total number of packages for the shipment.

totalGrossWeight.title: The totalGrossWeight schema
totalGrossWeight.description: Total Gross weight for the shipment.

weightMeasureQualifier.title: The weightMeasureQualifier schema
weightMeasureQualifier.description: The units that the weight is expressed in: KGM - Kilograms.

totalCube.title: The totalCube schema
totalCube.description: The number of cubic meters the shipment represents.

cubeMeasureQualifier.title: The cubeMeasureQualifier schema
cubeMeasureQualifier.description: The units the cubic weight is expressed in: MTQ - Cubic Meters.

equipmentQualifier.title: The equipmentQualifier schema
equipmentQualifier.description: Code identifying equipment: CN - Container, E - Trailer.

equipmentIdNumber.title: The equipmentIdNumber schema
equipmentIdNumber.description: The Equipment id number eg. container number.

supplier.title: The supplier schema
supplier.description: Code to identify who supplied the equipment: 1 - Shipper, 2 - Carrier.

measureQualifier.title: The measureQualifier schema
measureQualifier.description: Code identifying type of weight being reported on.

movementDimensionCode.title: The movementDimensionCode schema
movementDimensionCode.description: Code identifying what is being measured: T - Tare Weight, U - Unit weight (Container & Content).

termsOfDeliveryCode.title: The termsOfDeliveryCode schema
termsOfDeliveryCode.description: IncoTerm code identifying the delivery terms.

termsLocation.title: The termsLocation schema
termsLocation.description: Delivery terms incl locn eg EXW ANTRIM.
